name: Connect Them All! (TUĞRUL SÜBEKCİ)
description:
• I made a puzzle game about connecting the pops.
  • Thanks to the algorithm I wrote, the game doesn't end and continues forever.
  • Fully mobile optimized and has no performance problems.
  • I added vibration, Unity Ads, Appmetrica, Firebase Analytics and Messaging, Google Play Services and Airbridge. Also, I published on Google Play Store.
First time I've used:
  • Push notification (with Firebase Cloud Messaging)
  • In app update
  • In app review

View my GitHub Repository
